title: Why is there no ranked solo queue?
body: How come the solo queue queue is gone? I just want to hit plat again and I can't play...

replies.body:
Thanks for pointing this one out - sorry about the confusion.

The queue was turned off for a planned maintenance earlier, and while that completed just fine it looks like we did not turn Ranked Solo back on correctly. It should be all back up and running now though, so let me know if you are still seeing issues.

Keep those plat dreams alive!

Mindstar

> [{quoted}](name=Agent Mindstar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=yLERbJTl,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-10-29T22:34:35.437+0000)
>
> Thanks for pointing this one out - sorry about the confusion.
> 
> The queue was turned off for a planned maintenance earlier, and while that completed just fine it looks like we did not turn Ranked Solo back on correctly. It should be all back up and running now though, so let me know if you are still seeing issues.
> 
> Keep those plat dreams alive!
> 
> Mindstar

Thanks Mindstar. I got told that Riot Sephyre was the one who turned it back on but thanks to the rest of you guys as well.
LOL I PLAYED A GAME WITH YOU. you were like you can thank me for having the soloqueue turned back on and i thought it was a joke.

> [{quoted}](name=Quayer5,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=yLERbJTl,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2015-10-30T13:03:25.881+0000)
>

I don't joke good sir! Hahaha

>
> Its up now, relax

Yeah I posted on Reddit too and a Riot Employee saw it. Pretty happy right now
ive only got likke a week to get to diamond!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! {{item:3744}}
Ranked can't be down I gotta CLIMB
Yeah, there isn't even an alert icon at the top...
id really like to know why too
